description: Agave geminiflora RASTA MAN is an incredibly unique, eye-catching plant that makes a great addition to any garden. It features bright, long curved leaves in a wide variety of colors, including greens, oranges, and yellows. This plant requires minimal maintenance and can survive in both scorching hot and cold climates. It is also known for its slow growth rate - with some specimens growing only once every few years. Not only that, but this species of agave can reach sizes of up to 1.5 meters with age. Agave geminiflora RASTA MAN is undeniably a stunning showpiece in your outdoor landscape.
